attributes.action: Abolish all taxes in favour of 1 overall tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Get rid off all taxes, fuel, car tax, vat, and all others and have 1 tax  for everything, albiet probably about %30- %40 but we would know where we stand, it will be our choice what we do with our money, whether it be buying lots of clothes or filling up with petrol whenever we want.
